title: I Don't Have Time for these Games
itunes:title: I Don't Have Time for these Games
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, My husband and I have been married for 11 years and one of our main problems is his 14 year old daughter, my stepdaughter. To put it nicely, she is a liar and a manipulator. I have always treated her as if she was my own child and honestly, I treated her better than her own mother does......

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, My husband and I have been married for 11 years and one of our main problems is his 14 year old daughter, my stepdaughter. To put it nicely, she is a liar and a manipulator. I have always treated her as if she was my own child and honestly, I treated her better than her own mother does......
